column1: Never even consider it.

column2: you'll first hear a dripping.

column1: Then the wet slap of flesh on the concrete as your friends are consumed around you.

column3: I had seen Se7en after all. To my relief
column4: inside the box was a golden tree
column5: with a letter from Meryl.

column1: This used to remind me of my first #house
column2: where I laughed and played. I want you to have it
column3: to remind you of me."" She wrote.

column3: sorting out the bills when Riz came up and bit me.

column1: Ow! What was that for?"" I asked.
Don't need a #reason ta bite yer!"" Riz said mockingly.
You do if you want to avoid pain!"" I said
column2: lunging for him.

column1: Marcus handed the present to little Charlie with a shaky hand. Young Charlie ripped open the gift
column2: and found an old matchbox car.

column1: My grandfather gave that
column2: and now
column3: I'm giving it to you
column4: Marcus laughed
column5: a smile that continued as the child played.

My part in the ritual was seemingly complete

column1: He stalked the target as she'd put the bins out
column2: her one unguarded moment.

column1: How #kind of you to bring a bag to put the #bits in
column2: Void laughed as he enveloped her.

column1: I was being kind!""
Kind ta me! Kind ta me yer bleedin ejit! I've got debts ta pay nd gold statues ta buy!""
Hmm

Break the mind control!"" I replied

column2: I'm trying to survive the rigours of raising a family and two Shih Tzu dogs and a cat.;94251;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 08:55:30+00:00; ;1451109881025597440;en;41;1;1;8;Twitter for Android;"What else would a stampede of money-with-legs #signify then Gallows being nearby.

column1: Hi
column2: Bren!"" Gallows waved up
column3: letting the money just walk into his bag.

column1: Giv dat bak
column2: or else!"" Riz threatened.

column1: Or else what? You'll bite me?"" Gallows said in mock shock.
#amwriting #vss365"

column1: Oh

column3: she couldn't hide the #thrill of what she'd been told. Her ultimate #fun was reflecting the pain she'd been born with
column4: lashing out at the happiness she saw around her.

column2: I'm trying to survive the rigours of raising a family and two Shih Tzu dogs and a cat.;94251;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 08:42:35+00:00; ;1449294691787235330;en;55;0;7;14;Twitter for Android;"Despite my run of bad luck
column3: the scarecrow was just a scarecrow. It wasn't alive
column4: it wasn't infested with creatures
column5: it wasn't Goblins stacked up on other Goblins. My joy was short lived when Riz found the note attached
column6: one that read:

column1: 'More #fun ahead
column2: Bren!'

column1: #amwriting #vss365"

column5: one that he greatly enjoyed.

column1: The End

column3: that much was certain. No one had known who he was
column4: and no one stepped forward to after the fact. All that turned up in his #pocket was a faded photograph of him as a soldier and a note:

column1: We're all forgotten in the end.""
#amwriting #vss365"

column1: 1040231613769154560;Brennan_and_Riz;Peter James Martin;I'm Teesside born and bred. Autistic. When I'm not writing
column2: I'm trying to survive the rigours of raising a family and two Shih Tzu dogs and a cat.;94251;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-08-22 16:19:04+00:00; ;1429478237256785930;en;42;1;2;10;Twitter for Android;"The man trembled as he reached into his #pocket for his keys
column3: fumbling around with them as he fought to get into his car.

column1: Void watched the struggle
column2: enjoying the moment he crushed the car with the man inside. Turning it into a metal #coffin.

column1: #amwriting #vssmurder #vss365"
1040231613769154560;Brennan_and_Riz;Peter James Martin;I'm Teesside born and bred. Autistic. When I'm not writing
column2: I'm trying to survive the rigours of raising a family and two Shih Tzu dogs and a cat.;94251;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-08-22 14:56:10+00:00; ;1429457372309868547;en;39;1;2;5;Twitter for Android;"""A graveyard?"" Void asked as a funeral was under way. ""Is there demons in the #coffin? Ready to spring out and devour everyone?""

column1: Hah!"" Gabriel laughed
column2: putting his hands in his #pockets. ""A father should attend his sons funeral after all.""

column3: hold dis
column4: Riz asked
column5: sticking a piece of wire out of my #pocket.

column1: Why?"" I asked.
I'm settin up a lite.""
How you powering it?""
Der power plant I set up in yer other pocket.""
This was the other pocket that suddenly burst into flames...
#amwriting #vss365"

column3: Valarie and Riz were staring up at the sea of stars

column1: Doesn't it just #ignite your imagination
column2: Valarie mused. At that point me and Valarie turned to face Riz.

column1: Wat?""
This is the point where you normally kill the mood
column2: I said.

column1: I'm not dat predictable!""
#amwriting #vss365"

I'm not letting you order online anymore.""
